item.title: Mark Ronson feat. Bruno Mars - Uptown Funk - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Uptown Funk by Mark Ronson feat. Bruno Mars from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Dm, G7.
